about_us_subtitle: Your ultimate destination for premium sneakers and timeless style.
about_us_intro_1: Welcome to our sneaker paradise! We are a team passionate about footwear, living and breathing sneaker culture. Our journey began with a shared love for quality shoes, and today, we proudly bring you an outstanding sneaker collection from the world's most renowned brands.
about_us_intro_2: From classic streetwear to performance-driven designs, we carefully curate each pair of sneakers, ensuring every shoe tells a story of craftsmanship, innovation, and style. Whether you're chasing trends or building a timeless wardrobe, we're here to elevate your style.
mission_description: Our mission is to redefine the sneaker shopping experience by offering a top-tier, carefully curated collection that blends fashion, comfort, and durability. We aim to inspire confidence and creativity in every step you take, delivering products that elevate personal style while meeting the highest quality standards.
vision_description: We envision a world where every sneaker lover finds their perfect pair. By bridging iconic designs with modern innovation, we strive to be the leading platform for both enthusiasts and casual buyers, building a global community united by a love for exceptional footwear.
commitment_description_1: We are more than a store – we are your companion in the sneaker world. Our commitment goes beyond providing great products; it's about creating a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience. From lightning-fast delivery to hassle-free returns, we're with you every step of the way.
commitment_description_2: Our team prioritizes customer satisfaction above all. We work tirelessly to ensure every order is delivered on time, every question is answered promptly, and every customer leaves with a smile. Your trust fuels our passion, and we are committed to earning it with every pair of shoes we deliver.
join_us_title: Step Into the Future With Us
join_us_description: Ready to explore a sneaker world tailored to your style? Join our collection and become part of a community of style pioneers and sneaker enthusiasts today!

cancellation_reason_min_length: Cancellation reason must be at least 10 characters
return_policy_section1_item1: The product must be intact, unused, with original tags, box, and accessories.
return_policy_section1_item2: Return period: Within 7 days from the date of receipt.
return_policy_section1_item3: Products defective due to manufacturing issues (e.g., stitching errors, material damage).
return_policy_section1_item4: Purchase receipt or order code must be provided.
return_policy_section2_item1: Products that have been used or damaged by the customer.
return_policy_section2_item2: Missing original tags, box, or accessories.
return_policy_section2_item3: Products in categories not eligible for returns (notified before purchase).
return_policy_section2_item4: Beyond the 7-day return period from the date of receipt.
return_policy_section3_item1: Contact us via hotline 0399926999 or email hoanganhfullstack@gmail.com.
return_policy_section3_item2: Provide order information and describe the reason for the return.
return_policy_section3_item3: Send the product to: No. 1 Trinh Van Bo, Hanoi.
return_policy_section3_item4: After inspection, we will exchange for a new product or issue a refund within 5-7 working days.
return_policy_section4_item1: Free of charge if the product is defective due to manufacturing issues.
return_policy_section4_item2: Customers bear the shipping cost for returns due to personal reasons (e.g., wrong size, dislike of color).
return_policy_section5_description: If you have any questions, please contact:
faq_question1: How long can I return a product?
faq_answer1: You can return a product within 7 days from the date of receipt, as long as it is intact, unused, and includes all tags, box, and accessories.
faq_question2: How do I cancel an order?
faq_answer2: To cancel an order, go to 'Orders' in your account, select the order, enter a cancellation reason (minimum 10 characters), and confirm. The order will be processed within 1-2 working days.
faq_question3: How much is the shipping fee?
faq_answer3: Shipping fees depend on the delivery address, with a minimum of 0đ for some promotions. You will see the specific fee at checkout.
faq_answer4: We guarantee 100% authentic products, complete with invoices and warranty tags.
faq_answer5: You can pay with MoMo, VNPAY, domestic ATM card, Visa/MasterCard, or cash on delivery (COD).
faq_answer6: Delivery takes 1-3 working days in urban areas and 3-5 days for other regions. Express delivery within 2 hours is available in some major cities.
privacy_policy_intro: We are committed to protecting your personal information and ensuring your privacy when using our sneaker e-commerce website.
privacy_policy_section1_content: We collect personal information such as full name, email, phone number, and address when you register an account, place an order, or contact support. Additionally, we may collect usage data like browsing history to improve your experience.
privacy_policy_section2_content: Your information is used to process orders, provide customer service, send promotional notifications (if you consent), and enhance the website's quality. We do not use your data for purposes beyond your intent.
privacy_policy_section3_content: We implement advanced security measures such as SSL encryption, firewalls, and access controls to protect your personal data from unauthorized access or leaks.
privacy_policy_section4_content: You have the right to access, edit, or request the deletion of your personal information at any time. Contact us via email at hoanganhfullstack@gmail.com or hotline 0399922999 to exercise your rights.
privacy_policy_section5_content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to process orders (e.g., shipping partners) or as required by law.
how_to_buy_intro: Shopping for authentic sneakers on our website is easy! Follow the steps below for a seamless shopping experience.
how_to_buy_section1_content: Visit the Home page or Products section to explore our sneaker collection. Use filters (brand, size, price) or the search bar to find your favorite pair. Click on a product to view details, select size, and quantity.
how_to_buy_section2_content: After selecting a size, click Add to Cart or Buy Now. You need to log in to add items to your cart. If you don’t have an account, click Register to create one quickly.
how_to_buy_section3_content: Go to your Cart, review your items, and click Checkout. Enter shipping information (name, address, phone number). Choose a payment method: COD, MoMo, VNPAY, or bank card. Apply a discount code if available and confirm your order.
how_to_buy_section4_content: After placing an order, you’ll receive an order code via email or in the Orders section of your account. Track your delivery status (1-3 days for urban areas, 3-5 days for other regions). Contact 0399922999 for support if needed.
